module.name: StdActns
module.short: Defines some standard actions to be used in Action Lists in the LCL

element.name: THintAction
element.short: THintAction - standard action for dealing with requests for a Hint

element.name: TEditAction
element.short: TEditAction - base class for actions associated with the various Edit menu options

element.name: TEditAction.FControl
element.short: FControl - local variable holding the Edit control associated with this action

element.name: TEditAction.SetControl
element.short: SetControl - specifies the Edit control associated with this action

element.name: TEditAction.Control
element.short: The Edit Control associated with this action

element.name: TEditCut
element.short: TEditCut- standard action associated with the Edit Cut menu option

element.name: TEditCopy
element.short: TEditCopy - standard action associated with the Edit Copy menu option

element.name: TEditPaste
element.short: TEditPaste - standard action associated with the Edit Paste menu option

element.name: TEditSelectAll
element.short: TEditSelectAll - standard action associated with the Edit Select All menu option

element.name: TEditUndo
element.short: TEditUndo - standard action associated with the Edit Undo menu option

element.name: TEditDelete
element.short: TEditDelete - standard action associated with the Edit Delete menu option

element.name: THelpAction
element.short: THelpAction - base class for actions associated with the various Help menu options

element.name: THelpContents
element.short: THelpContents - standard action associated with the Help Contents menu option

element.name: THelpTopicSearch
element.short: THelpTopicSearch - standard action associated with the Help Topic Search menu option

element.name: THelpOnHelp
element.short: THelpOnHelp - standard action associated with the Help On Help menu item (ie how to get help)

element.name: THelpContextAction
element.short: THelpContextAction - standard action for providing context-sensitive Help

element.name: TCommonDialogClass
element.short: TCommonDialogClass - class of TCommonDialog

element.name: TCommonDialogAction
element.short: TCommonDialogAction - base class for providing actions associated with Dialogs

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.FDialog
element.short: FDialog - local variable holding the Dialog associated with this action

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.DoAccept
element.short: DoAccept - perform the code for the OnAccept event

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.DoCancel
element.short: DoCancel - perform the code for the OnCancel event

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.GetDialogClass
element.short: GetDialogClass - returns the class of dialog associated with this action

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.ExecuteResult
element.short: ExecuteResult - the result of the execution: True if successful

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.BeforeExecute
element.short: BeforeExecute - event handler for performance before execution of the action

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.OnAccept
element.short: OnAccept - event handler for a press of the Accept button

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.OnCancel
element.short: OnCancel - event handler for a press of the Cancel button

element.name: TFileAction
element.short: TFileAction - base class for providing actions associated with various file dialogs and menu options

element.name: TFileAction.GetDialog
element.short: GetDialog - returns a TOpenDialog for use in this File action

element.name: TFileAction.FileName
element.short: The FileName on which this action performs

element.name: TFileOpen
element.short: TFileOpen - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Open menu option

element.name: TFileOpen.Dialog
element.short: The OpenDialog to be used with this action

element.name: TFileOpen.UseDefaultApp
element.short: UseDefaultApp - if True, the default application should be used with this action

element.name: TFileOpenWith
element.short: TFileOpenWith - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Open With menu option

descr.p: TFileOpenWith - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Open With menu option
Gives the User an opportunity to choose the application with which to open a file

element.name: TFileOpenWith.AfterOpen
element.short: AfterOpen - event handler to be performed after file is opened

element.name: TFileSaveAs
element.short: TFileSaveAs - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Save As menu option

descr.p: TFileSaveAs - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Save As menu option
Gives the user an opportunity to select or enter a name to use for saving the file

element.name: TFileSaveAs.Dialog
element.short: The SaveDialog to be used with this action

element.name: TFileExit
element.short: TFileExit - standard action (closing file and terminating application) associated with the File Exit menu option

element.name: TSearchAction
element.short: TSearchAction - base class for the actions associated with the various Search menu options

element.name: TSearchAction.FControl
element.short: FControl - local variable holding the control for use with this action

element.name: TSearchAction.Search
element.short: Performs the Search

element.name: TFontEdit
element.short: TFontEdit - standard action for opening a Font Edit dialog

element.name: TFontEdit.Dialog
element.short: The FontDialog to use for this action

element.name: TColorSelect
element.short: TColorSelect - standard action for opening a Colour Selection dialog

element.name: TColorSelect.Dialog
element.short: The ColorDialog to use with this action

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.DoBeforeExecute
element.short: DoBeforeExecute - perform the code for the BeforeExecute event

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.CreateDialog
element.short: CreateDialog - method for creating the dialog

element.name: TSearchAction.UpdateControl
element.short: UpdateControl - brings the control performing the action up to date

element.name: TSearchAction.PerformSearch
element.short: PerformSearch - returns True if the search is to be performed

element.name: TSearchAction.ShowNotFound
element.short: ShowNotFound - method to display the 'Not Found' message

element.name: TSearchFind
element.short: TSearchFind - the action associated with a Search and Find dialog (as opposed to search and replace)

element.name: TSearchFind.Dialog
element.short: The FindDialog to be used with this action

element.name: TSearchReplace
element.short: TSearchReplace - action associated with the Search and Replace menu option and dialogs

element.name: TSearchReplace.Replace
element.short: Replace - the method to perform the Replace action once the specified text has been found

element.name: TSearchReplace.Dialog
element.short: The ReplaceDialog to be used with this action

element.name: TSearchFindFirst
element.short: TSearchFindFirst - Search action to find the first match

element.name: TSearchFindNext
element.short: TSearchFindNext - search action to find the next match

element.name: TSearchFindNext.SearchFind
element.short: The SearchFind action to use for searching
